ExtensionManifest.Name: ScreenConnect Guardian
ExtensionManifest.Author: Â© 2015 CODEFIDELITY (@jlyric)
ExtensionManifest.ShortDescription: Plugin for use with corresponding ScreenConnect Guardian PowerShell script.

Setting.Name: AllowedOrigin
Setting.Description: The domain that's allowed to call into the service.

Setting.Name: IntegrationKey
Setting.Description: This key should match the integration key within the ScreenConnect Guardian PowerShell script installed on client machines.
